 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְמָדֵר‎</span> ?], also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְמָדַ֔ר֖‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְמָדַ֑ר‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Song.7.13|Song 7:13]]</sup> ==blossom of grape== (just at flowering Duval<sup>REJ xiv (1887), 227 ff.</sup> Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סמדר‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Mandean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סימאדרא‎</span> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M. 128</sup>); — always absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span>, only Canticles: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַגְּפָנִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְמָדַר֖‎</span> [[Song.2.13|Song 2:13]] ***the vines are*** (all) ***blossom***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּרָמִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְמָדַ֑ר‎</span> v[[Song.2.15|Song 2:15]] (on bold predicate compare [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:141d»§ 141d</sup>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּתַּךְִ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסְּמָדַ֔ר‎</span> [[Song.7.13|Song 7:13]] ***the blossom has opened*** (its buds).
